AboutUs.title: Innovation Conveyor
AboutUs.problemTitle: THE PROBLEM: Our world loses up to 70% of innovative ideas and solutions that don't even survive to proof of concept
AboutUs.problemText1: Psychological difficulties at different levels: Internal and external psychological barriers and dimensions
AboutUs.problemText2: Multidisciplinary challenges: Lack of expertise in key areas, marketing, legal, finance. Lack of competencies is a barrier for innovators.
AboutUs.problemText3: Conceptual jam: The long and difficult journey from idea inception to proof of concept, creating serious challenges.
AboutUs.solutionText: A platform designed to accumulate and test innovations at the Pre-seed stage as quickly as possible. On the one hand, the solution is individualized and at the same time the principle of the conveyor belt is applied.
AboutUs.solutionPoint7: Building into the DNA of a startup
AboutUs.featuresText1: Idea pitch: The innovator delivers the idea on the platform using customized templates in a psychologically safe environment.
AboutUs.featuresText2: Lightning-fast innovation validation: After signing the NDA and adaptive presentation, the innovation is subjected to rapid pipeline validation and filtering.
AboutUs.featuresText3: Full and in-depth validation: Once the concept has been validated, a comprehensive analysis of the innovation is carried out and a final report is prepared.
AboutUs.featuresText4: Multi-level assessment: Information is sent to specialized departments for a comprehensive assessment
AboutUs.benefitsText1: Psychological comfort: Innovators will have access to a psychologically safe environment where their emotional needs are taken into account and stress levels are reduced when presenting their ideas and allowing them to focus on innovation
AboutUs.benefitsText2: Accelerated optimization of processes and resources: With lightning-fast innovation validation and built-in templates for presentations and videos, innovators save time and resources by gaining quick access to evaluate their ideas and potential investors.
AboutUs.benefitsText3: Effective Support and Development: Innovators can concentrate as much as possible on their innovative solutions. The parent company will take care of procedural issues.
AboutUs.customerText1: Beginning Innovators: People who are trying their hand at creating startups or innovative projects for the first time.
AboutUs.customerText2: Researchers: Science and research professionals interested in commercializing their research.
AboutUs.customerText3: Experienced Innovators: People with experience in developing and implementing innovative projects, looking for support and new opportunities.
AboutUs.differenceText1: Innovative concept: We work with the earliest stage of an idea. From the moment it first appeared to the innovator. Our concept allows us to work at the earliest stages and identify the most innovative solutions.
AboutUs.differenceText2: Innovative concept of creating future companies: We develop and complete the creation of "Reinventing Organizations" based on the principle of sharing participation, responsibility and income among all employees, from top management to front-line workers and this is fundamentally different from the existing ones.
AboutUs.differenceText3: Attracting investment: Investors' attention is on the issue of not losing investments, while founders' attention is on attracting vital finances at any cost. And both sides are right. And the idea? Innovation? It remains unattended and is transformed according to circumstances. Solution: Create a concept where all parties calmly receive what they need.
